Text: Please don't stop uploading the Factor. Comcast just went to digital, and I really don't feel like paying over $100 to watch just the few shows that are worth my time. Most of the shows I watch, I get off of PirateBay anyway... Thanks!
I KNOW!  I was freaking out there for a moment when I he didn't upload the show from 2 days ago!
is it possible for you to start an RSS feed for this, so that we can auto-download new episodes?
